sentences.sContent: ...a government comprised mainly of the elite.

remMethod.val: e + lit(=lig选择) + e → 选出来的 → 精英

words.tran: 精英主义；杰出人物统治论

trans.tranCn: 精英； 主力， 中坚
trans.tranOther: You can refer to the most powerful, rich, or talented people within a particular group, place, or society as the elite
